summary: See, the Andi Mack community is small. Smaller than many of the other fanbases around tumblr anyway. It's like stepping into a...
body:
See, the Andi Mack community is small. Smaller than many of the other fanbases around tumblr anyway. It’s like stepping into a party with a group of people you’d probably never get a chance to mingle with if it wasn’t for having the shared interest of a show about a thirteen-year-old girl and her two best friends.

And here’s the thing, you come into the party all nervous and fidgeting hands, looking down at your shoes and chewing lips, and in every corner you turn to, there’s a friendly face. They all welcome you with open arms and sunny smiles. And you find yourself fitting right in.

summary: Not to rush you or anything, but I feel like you should pick up the pace on the PCP somehow (you’re doing AMAZING trust me I’m...
question: Not to rush you or anything, but I feel like you should pick up the pace on the PCP somehow (you’re doing AMAZING trust me I’m not trying to be mean!!) I imagine that if Disney formally c*nceled AM, they might do it before the end of June, and news articles would state “The final episodes will roll out through Summer 2019”
answer:
No offense but like, what do you expect me to do? I spent months asking if anyone wanted to contribute by folding some of the cranes, and never got many serious responses. I folded the first 500 cranes completely by myself in less than a week. I folded an additional 200 cranes while I was literally on vacation. I opened submissions for messages like a week ago and have now started writing them on the cranes. I opened donations so that people can help me pay for faster shipping. I can’t help how quickly other people send in their responses or donate or help spread the word. Like I have done everything I possibly can to get this done as quick as possible. The rest of this is in the hands of the rest of the fanbase. I need HELP getting enough submissions, paying for shipping, and spreading the word. I am doing everything that I can do on my own already.

Also worth noting that I’m well aware that this is time sensitive, given that I’m the one who organized the campaign, I was one of the first people to predict a June return, and I’ve said for MONTHS that if they decide to cancel the series, the final episodes will probably be advertised as much. I understand that you aren’t trying to be mean, but it’s still insensitive and unrealistic to expect ME to pick up the pace. Instead of telling me to speed things up, perhaps try asking if there’s anything YOU can do to help me get done faster? And if you’re not interested in helping, then just don’t get involved ya know.

Please keep spreading the word about the campaign so we can get it done as soon as possible. I don’t have many AM twitter followers so I feel like not as many people over there are seeing it. So if any of you are in twitter group chats about the show or just have a significant following of AM fans over there, please spread the word there by linking posts or posting screenshots of posts found on @ampapercraneproject

tags: i think im just reminded of new episodes every week last summer
summary: Idk why but I feel like we should getting a new episode this week (obviously we're not but it feels like we're supposed to)....
body: Idk why but I feel like we should getting a new episode this week (obviously we’re not but it feels like we’re supposed to). Something about the fact that it’s 80 degrees outside (after there having just been snow on the ground yesterday), the sun shining, and the semester quickly coming to an end,,,looking forward to a new andi mack this week would have been the cherry on top, and yet………. maybe this is a sign that we’ll be getting some new content this week, who knows
